nodes.text: 7L-VN was a R2-series astromech droid that was often used to assist Jedi in the Jedi Temple during the Clone Wars.

7L-VN is a droid in Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures that follows players around. It was only available during a promotional event on July 11, 2011. Players had to buy a Station Cash card from 7-Eleven and redeem it for Sony Online Entertainment's virtual Station Cash currency the same day to receive this droid as a reward.
